string.name: name
string.value: Sunny Day

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling sun floating over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Moon & the Stars

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling moon floating around in a sea of stars over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Colorful Rainbow

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a rainbow in its full 7 colors floating next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Little Devil

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see Lilly the cute little devil floating around next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows a submarine under the water. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for Love

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the longing to be with someone special. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Angel

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely effect that shows a baby angel floating around as your protector. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being wanted around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Jackpot

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect used to increase the chance of winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Martial Effect

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that appears Chinese Falg. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Play with Me

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see two babies floating on the cloud as a sign of friendship. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays that the owner would like to be left alone. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special equalizer effect that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect of the fireworks that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Stormy Cloud

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the stormy cloud with rain and lightning hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: 777 Effect

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect used to increase the number of balls obtained from winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A siren effect that can be used under emergencies. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: name
string.value: Twinkling Star

string.name: desc
string.value: A special star effect for a special day. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A smile effect best used when you're in a great mood! Designate a a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heart effect you can use to show your love to the others. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: name
string.value: Go! Korea!

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that follows your character for the supporting of Korea's victory. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: name
string.value: Skeleton of Horror

string.name: desc
string.value: This skull was found somewhere around the remains, and it'll be with you until you wish for otherwise. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Twinkling Star

string.name: desc
string.value: A number of twinkling stars surrounds the character in this special effect.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumping Heart

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that captures the feeling of wanting to express the feeling of love to someone special. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: The Flocking Ducks

string.name: desc
string.value: A family of toy ducks follow around the character. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: Silent Spectre

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a spooky ghost appirate behind you and scare the daylights out of everyone nearby! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Indigo Dracula

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a horde of Dracula's finest bats appear and surround your character with alluring nocturne ambience. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Hot Head

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that perfectly represents the feeling of anger. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: Indigo Flames

string.name: name
string.value: My Girlfriend

string.name: desc
string.value: Show the world how much you adore your girlfriend with this attractive marker! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Sheer Fear

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect perfect for instances where you were caught off-guard. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Christmas Tree

string.name: desc
string.value: If you ever felt like becoming a Christmas Tree, here's your chance! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Shower Power

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that pours massive amount of water on top of the head. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a spotlight above the head of the character. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Super Symphony

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that follows the character around which can be used to express the feeling of happiness and joy. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Busy Bee

string.name: desc
string.value: A very busy bee that's never distracted from following you. Keeps one focused on the task at hand.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a blinding glow on the character’s eyes. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Shadow Style

string.name: desc
string.value: Traces of the character remains while the character moves, creating multiple images of the character in the process. Double-click on the icon, or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Struck by Lightning

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the lightning striking on the character’s head. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Champion

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: Jingling Santa

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays Santa and his two trusty reindeers breaking down to the beat, hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a UFO and a number of colorful aliens accompanying the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: Garden Trail

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a trail of flowers and grass left behind by the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.value: Flower Fairy

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows a cute fairy sprinkling flowers. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: name
string.value: Changing to a Monster

string.name: desc
string.value: Not sold in Cash Shop. An effect shown while changing into a monster.

string.name: name
string.value: Water Balloon

string.name: desc
string.value: A cool blue water balloon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the water balloon effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Paper Plane

string.name: desc
string.value: A nicely-folded paper plane. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the paper plane effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Energy Ball

string.name: desc
string.value: A ball of concentrated energy. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the energy effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Super Star

string.name: desc
string.value: A red starfish that can be seen at the beach. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the starfish effect.\n\nThis item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Winged Baseball

string.name: desc
string.value: A baseball with small wings attached to it. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the winged baseball effect.\n\nThis item cannot be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: The official football of the MapleBowl. When held in your inventory, #cthrowing stars# will appear as a thrown football.

string.name: name
string.value: Chalkboard Eraser

string.name: desc
string.value: A chalkboard eraser commonly found in classrooms. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the eraser effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Shooting Hearts

string.name: desc
string.value: A small pink heart of love that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the heart effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Throwing Teddy

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable brown teddy bear that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the teddy bear effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Throwing Pepe

string.name: desc
string.value: Never in Pepe's wildest dreams did it think it'd be chucked down the field in place of the throwing star. Thrown with a throwing star to have the Pepe effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Puff Throwing Star

string.name: desc
string.value: A throwing star make to look like Mr. Puff, with its huffy puffy cheeks resembling that of a tasty-looking steamed bun. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Mr. Puff effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Skull Striker

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted skull straight from the Headless Horseman. Thrown with a throwing star to have the skull striker effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Bomb

string.name: desc
string.value: Harmless pie? Think again. Thrown with a throwing star to have the pumpkin bomb effect.

string.name: name
string.value: Pirate Bomb

string.name: desc
string.value: An explosive bomb used by the legendary pirates. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Poo Stars

string.name: desc
string.value: That nasty poop can be detected from afar. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the nasty poop effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Egg Throwing Star

string.name: desc
string.value: A white egg thrown in place of the throwing star, and that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Chick effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mischievous ball that has gained sentience, and now lives to be thrown for massive damage. Tremendous striking power! Equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Disc

string.name: desc
string.value: An explosive throwing star used by the Dragon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: name
string.value: Throwing Boomers

string.name: desc
string.value: Explosive throwing stars from New Leaf City. They're the Bomb! This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: name
string.value: Exploding Sheep

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute and cuddly sheep. Don't let it fool you--it's lethal. This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Elf, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.name: name
string.value: The Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

string.name: name
string.value: Teleport Coke

string.name: desc
string.value: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

string.name: name
string.value: VIP Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

string.name: name
string.value: AP Reset

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the #cscroll that allows you to reset 1 AP from the ability stat#. Choose one AP from HP, MP, STR, DEX, INT, or LUK , and allocate it to the desired category. The lowest an AP level can reach on any category is 4.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (1st job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (2nd job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (3rd job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 2nd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (4th job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Item Tag

string.name: desc
string.value: This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character name on it.

string.name: name
string.value: Sealing Lock

string.name: desc
string.value: A lock that seals away any equipment items and throwing stars, excluding the quest items. By sealing the item away, the item will be #cdisabled from selling, trading, or throwing away#. Double-click on the lock to un-seal the item.

string.name: desc
string.value: An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#. Pigme eggs canve incubated by double clicking the incubator.

string.name: name
string.value: Cheap Megaphone

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.

string.name: name
string.value: Super Megaphone

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.

string.name: name
string.value: Heart Megaphone

string.name: desc

string.name: name

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: MapleTV Messenger

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your avatar on Maple TV with messages.\nIn case of dedication messages, character you have designated will also appear on the screen throughout the entire world. The message will last appx. 15 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: MapleTV Star Messenger

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautifully designed TV with star effects. \nThis allows you to type in longer messages with longer period of time, 30 seconds. Only announcement type of message is available with this item. The message will last for 30 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: MapleTV Heart Messenger

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautifully designed TV with Heart effect.\nPropose in style on the TV. This item only allows dedication type of message where designated user also appears on the TV. The message will last for 1 minute.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month.
